show_name: The case files of Jeweler Richard (TV)
other_title: 宝石商リチャード氏の謎鑑定 (Japanese)
plot: Handsome jewelry appraiser Richard Ranashinha Dvorpian and the bright and cheerful college student Seigi Nakata uncover the hidden messages that lies within jewels.
opening_theme: "Hōseki no Umareru Toki" (宝石の生まれるとき; When Jewels are Born) by Nagi Yanagi
